keyMoments.title: Garp Arrives at Water 7
keyMoments.description: Vice-Admiral Garp arrives at Water 7 with his fleet, bringing Koby and Helmeppo. His presence immediately creates tension.
keyMoments.significance: Garp's arrival in the Post-Enies Lobby arc sets up major family revelations.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates 'Fist of Love'
keyMoments.description: Garp punches through a wall and strikes Luffy with his 'Fist of Love,' causing Luffy pain despite his rubber body.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Garp's ability to bypass Luffy's Devil Fruit immunity, establishing him as a formidable fighter.
keyMoments.quote: No one can escape my Fist of Love!

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Luffy's Grandfather
keyMoments.description: Luffy casually calls Garp 'Gramps,' shocking everyone present and revealing their family connection.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation establishing Garp's relationship to Luffy and adding complexity to the protagonist's heritage.

abilities.description: A powerful punch that can hurt Luffy despite his rubber body. Garp claims it works through 'love,' though it may be Armament Haki.

relationships.description: Garp is Luffy's paternal grandfather who raised him as a child.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp's relationship to Luffy is revealed when Luffy casually calls him 'Gramps.'

relationships.description: Garp is training Koby and Helmeppo in the Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Koby appears with Garp at Water 7, showing he's under Garp's command and training.

relationships.description: Garp is training Helmeppo alongside Koby.

evolutionMoments.description: Helmeppo appears with Garp at Water 7 as one of his trainees.

reveals.information: Garp possesses the 'Fist of Love' technique that can hurt Luffy
Known as 'Garp the Fist' and 'Hero of the Marines'

keyMoments.title: Michael Attempts to Mug Zoro
keyMoments.description: Michael and his partner Hoichael attempt to mug Zoro in the streets of Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: Anime-original scene showcasing local Water 7 delinquents who idolize Franky.

relationships.description: Michael's criminal partner and fellow Franky admirer.

evolutionMoments.description: Michael and Hoichael work together to attempt mugging Zoro.

relationships.description: Michael idolizes Franky and dresses like him.

evolutionMoments.description: Michael is shown to be a Franky fanboy from Water 7's backstreets.

reveals.information: Criminal record includes vandalism, shoplifting, and has been caught 620+ times

keyMoments.title: Hoichael Attempts to Mug Zoro
keyMoments.description: Hoichael and his partner Michael attempt to mug Zoro in the streets of Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: Anime-original scene showcasing local Water 7 delinquents who idolize Franky.

relationships.description: Hoichael's criminal partner and fellow Franky admirer.

evolutionMoments.description: Michael and Hoichael work together to attempt mugging Zoro.

relationships.description: Hoichael idolizes Franky and dresses like him.

evolutionMoments.description: Hoichael is shown to be a Franky fanboy from Water 7's backstreets.

reveals.information: Criminal record includes vandalism, shoplifting, and has been caught 620+ times

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Luffy and Zoro
keyMoments.description: Koby reunites with Luffy and Zoro at Water 7, having transformed significantly through his Marine training under Garp.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Koby's parallel growth alongside the Straw Hats, demonstrating how far he's come from the cowardly cabin boy.

relationships.description: Koby is being trained by Vice-Admiral Garp.

evolutionMoments.description: Koby appears at Water 7 as Garp's trainee, showing their mentor-student relationship.

relationships.description: Despite being on opposite sides, Koby and Luffy maintain mutual respect and friendship.

evolutionMoments.description: Koby reunites with Luffy, showing their friendship has endured despite their different paths.

reveals.information: Koby has transformed significantly through training, to the point Luffy barely recognizes him

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Luffy and Zoro
keyMoments.description: Helmeppo reunites with Luffy and Zoro at Water 7. Luffy and Zoro don't recognize him at all, showing how much he's changed through his training.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Helmeppo's complete transformation from spoiled brat to disciplined Marine trainee.

relationships.description: Helmeppo is being trained by Vice-Admiral Garp alongside Koby.

evolutionMoments.description: Helmeppo appears at Water 7 as Garp's trainee.

relationships.description: Helmeppo trains alongside Koby under Garp.

evolutionMoments.description: Helmeppo and Koby arrive together at Water 7, showing their continued partnership.

reveals.information: Helmeppo has changed so much through training that Luffy and Zoro don't recognize him

keyMoments.title: Reveals Plan to Build Dream Ship with Adam Wood
keyMoments.description: Franky reveals his plan to use the legendary Treasure Tree Adam to build the Straw Hats' new ship, the same material used in Gol D. Roger's ship.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Franky's commitment to the crew and sets up the construction of the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to build them a dream ship using the Treasure Tree Adam!

keyMoments.title: Adam Wood Arrives in Water 7
keyMoments.description: Franky receives confirmation that the Adam wood he purchased has arrived, marking the beginning of the ship-building process.
keyMoments.significance: A crucial step toward building the Thousand Sunny.

reveals.information: Franky used the stolen 200 million berries to purchase Treasure Tree Adam for the Straw Hats' new ship

keyMoments.title: Vulnerable to Garp's 'Fist of Love'
keyMoments.description: Luffy is punched by Garp and feels pain despite his rubber body, showing he's not immune to certain attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Luffy's Devil Fruit powers have limitations and can be bypassed by powerful techniques.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Garp as His Grandfather
keyMoments.description: Luffy casually calls Garp 'Gramps,' shocking the entire crew with this family revelation.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation about Luffy's heritage that adds complexity to his journey as a pirate.

relationships.description: Garp is Luffy's paternal grandfather who raised him as a child.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy casually reveals Garp as his grandfather to the shocked crew.

reveals.information: Luffy can be hurt by Garp's 'Fist of Love' despite his rubber body
